duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide personal care assistance to maintain the independence of participants in conducting daily activities.
Supervise and support participant behavior, including reality orientation, medication instruction, and emotional reassurance.
Assist with general activities such as conversation, recreation, meal serving, and housekeeping.

education_certification.credential: Active Certified Nurse Assistant (CNA) in the state where PACE Organization is located.
Minimum of one (1) year of documented experience working with a frail or elderly population.
